name: Jedi Lightsaber
Lore: 'Elegant sword of pure energy. ''This is the weapon of a Jedi Knight. Not as clumsy or as random as a blaster. A lightsaber can be dangerous to an unskilled user.''',
Text: 'Use X Force to deploy on your warrior where X = (7 - warrior''s ability). May add 1 to Force drain where present. May target a character or creature by using X Force. Draw two destiny. Target hit if total destiny > defense value.',
